alert.note: Alert for Lafayette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 05 at 9:30AM CDT until November 05 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lafayette County in south central Wisconsin... * Until 1015 AM CDT. * At 929 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Council Hill to near Elizabeth to near Hanover, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Darlington, Shullsburg, Belmont, Benton, Argyle, Blanchardville, Wiota, New Diggings, South Wayne, Elk Grove, Fayette, Lamont, Gratiot, Platte Mounds, Calamine, Lead Mine, Yellowstone Lake St Park and Woodford. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
